queries.main:
SELECT sessionId=s.session_id
 ,status=r.STATUS
 ,blockedBy=r.blocking_session_id
 ,waitType=r.wait_type
, waitResource=r.wait_resource
, waitTime=CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(ms, r.wait_time, 0), 8)
, cpuTime=r.cpu_time
, logicalReads=r.logical_reads
, r.reads
 ,r.writes
,elapsedTime=CONVERT(varchar, (r.total_elapsed_time/1000 / 86400))+ 'd ' +
 CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(ms, r.total_elapsed_time, 0), 8)
 ,queryText=CAST((
         '<?query --  ' + CHAR(13) + CHAR(13) + Substring(st.TEXT, (r.statement_start_offset / 2) + 1, (
  (
 CASE r.statement_end_offset
 WHEN - 1
 THEN Datalength(st.TEXT)
  ELSE r.statement_end_offset
 END - r.statement_start_offset
) / 2
) + 1) + CHAR(13) + CHAR(13) + '--?>'
 ) AS XML)
, storedProc=COALESCE(
 QUOTENAME(DB_NAME(st.dbid)) + N'.' + 
 QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(st.objectid, st.dbid)) + N'.' +
 QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(st.objectid, st.dbid)), ''
)
  --,qp.query_plan AS 'xml_plan'  -- uncomment (1) if you want to see plan
, r.command
 ,loginName=s.login_name
 ,hostName=s.host_name
 ,programName=s.program_name
 ,hostProcessId=s.host_process_id
 ,lastRequestEndTime=s.last_request_end_time
 ,loginTime=s.login_time
 ,openTransactionCount=r.open_transaction_count
 FROM sys.dm_exec_sessions AS s
 INNER JOIN sys.dm_exec_requests AS r ON r.session_id = s.session_id
 CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(r.sql_handle) AS st
 --OUTER APPLY sys.dm_exec_query_plan(r.plan_handle) AS qp -- uncomment (2) if you want to see plan
 WHERE r.wait_type NOT LIKE 'SP_SERVER_DIAGNOSTICS%' AND  r.session_id != @@SPID
 ORDER BY r.blocking_session_id

SELECT sessionId=s.session_id
 ,status=r.STATUS
 ,blockedBy=r.blocking_session_id
 ,waitType=r.wait_type
, waitResource=r.wait_resource
, waitTime=CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(ms, r.wait_time, 0), 8)
, cpuTime=r.cpu_time
, logicalReads=r.logical_reads
, r.reads
 ,r.writes
,elapsedTime=CONVERT(varchar, (r.total_elapsed_time/1000 / 86400))+ 'd ' +
 CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(ms, r.total_elapsed_time, 0), 8)
 ,queryText=CAST((
         '<?query --  ' + CHAR(13) + CHAR(13) + Substring(st.TEXT, (r.statement_start_offset / 2) + 1, (
  (
 CASE r.statement_end_offset
 WHEN - 1
 THEN Datalength(st.TEXT)
  ELSE r.statement_end_offset
 END - r.statement_start_offset
) / 2
) + 1) + CHAR(13) + CHAR(13) + '--?>'
 ) AS XML)
, storedProc=COALESCE(
 QUOTENAME(DB_NAME(st.dbid)) + N'.' + 
 QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(st.objectid, st.dbid)) + N'.' +
 QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(st.objectid, st.dbid)), ''
)
  --,qp.query_plan AS 'xml_plan'  -- uncomment (1) if you want to see plan
, r.command
 ,loginName=s.login_name
 ,hostName=s.host_name
 ,programName=s.program_name
 ,hostProcessId=s.host_process_id
 ,lastRequestEndTime=s.last_request_end_time
 ,loginTime=s.login_time
 ,openTransactionCount=r.open_transaction_count
 FROM sys.dm_exec_sessions AS s
 INNER JOIN sys.dm_exec_requests AS r ON r.session_id = s.session_id
 CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(r.sql_handle) AS st
 --OUTER APPLY sys.dm_exec_query_plan(r.plan_handle) AS qp -- uncomment (2) if you want to see plan
 WHERE r.wait_type NOT LIKE 'SP_SERVER_DIAGNOSTICS%'  AND r.total_elapsed_time > :elapsedTimeParam 
 AND r.session_id != @@SPID
 ORDER BY r.blocking_session_id

select dp1.name, string_agg(dp2.name,', ') as role from sys.database_role_members drm join sys.database_principals dp1 on dp1.principal_id=drm.member_principal_id join sys.database_principals dp2 on dp2.principal_id=drm.role_principal_id group by dp1.name
